column1: # TO BE USED TO INSERT MODEL ANNOTATIONS IN METABOLIC ATLAS DATABASE
# for GENES ONLY
# annotations will be visible in the GEM browser pages and some can be used by the search engine
# some rules:
# this is a TAB separated file, thus TABs are not allowed in any field values
# each line added must have exactly 25 columns to be parsed properly
# do not modify the @ line
# column 'ID' is mandatory, other columns are optional
# external_id / external_link must be filled as pair to be valid
# be consistent with external ids: e.g. if a UNIPROT ID has been provided as external_id1 for gene #1, you must provide a UNIPROT ID as external_id1 for gene #2 as well
# follow the max size limits
# columns description:
# column name        | max size | description
# name               | 255      | primary name of the gene
# name_link          | 255      | ID URL, if the model ID is from an external database
# alt_name1          | 255      | long name or full name of the gene
# alt_name2          | 255      | another commonly use name or protein name
# aliases            | 2000     | list of aliases, semi-colon separated values
# external_id1       | 100       | the identifier (only) in a external database
# external_link1     | 255      | full URL to associate with the ‘external_id1’ column
# external_id2       | 100       | the identifier (only) in a external database
# external_link2     | 255      | full URL to associate with the ‘external_id2’ column
# external_id3       | 100       | the identifier (only) in a external database
# external_link3     | 255      | full URL to associate with the ‘external_id3’ column
# external_id4       | 100       | the identifier (only) in a external database
# external_link4     | 255      | full URL to associate with the ‘external_id4’ column
# external_id5       | 100       | the identifier (only) in a external database
# external_link5     | 255      | full URL to associate with the ‘external_id5’ column
# external_id6       | 100       | the identifier (only) in a external database
# external_link6     | 255      | full URL to associate with the ‘external_id6’ column
# external_id7       | 100       | the identifier (only) in a external database
# external_link7     | 255      | full URL to associate with the ‘external_id7’ column
# external_id8       | 100       | the identifier (only) in a external database
# external_link8     | 255      | full URL to associate with the ‘external_id8’ column
# function           | 3000     | some text about the function, can describe multiple functions
# ec                 | 255      | EC code, semi-colon separated values
# catalytic_activity | 2000     | some text about the catalytic activity
# In this line specify the name of external databases used for name_link and external_id columns:
# e.g. replace [external_id2] with "UNIPROT" if the 'external_id2' column contains UNIPROT IDs and the 'external_link2' column UNIPROT links.
@ID
